h1_38: University of Alabama Medical Center Program
span_48: University of Alabama at Birmingham School of Medicine
p_65: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_69: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_80: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: The UAB Department of Dermatology is committed to providing comprehensive dermatological services through high-quality patient care, innovative basic science, clinical research, and comprehensive education. We strive to meet and exceed the needs of the public while cultivating ways to serve and care for the community. Our residency program covers adult and pediatric clinical dermatology, dermatopathology, cosmetics, surgery, and clinical and basic research.

p_349: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
